document.full_text: the international criminal court called on the united nations security council on thursday to take action over the failure of djibouti to arrest the sudanese president.
document.title: europe: netherlands: court asks u.n. to take action against djibouti
lines_and_colors: the international criminal court called on the united nations security council on thursday to take action over the failure of djibouti to arrest the sudanese president.
